/**
 * Returns the first found element of `arr` that satisfies `predicate` check
 * @param {Array} arr 
 * @param {Function} predicate 
 */
export const find = (arr, predicate) => {

    }

      const element = arr[i];

        return element;
      }
    }
  
    return null;
  }
